'''The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete [[The End of the Sabzeruz Festival]], which is not the last quest in [[The Morn a Thousand Roses Brings]].
